metadata.name: ORB #001
metadata.description: IMPORTANT: The OROCHI Badge is the highest honorary membership of the OROCHIverse and includes all the benefits of the Orochi ecosystem. These benefits include NFT airdrops, priority access to game trials, priority purchase rights for artist projects on the art platform, eligibility for priority NFT purchases, and priority access to whitelisted community projects. Additionally, there are tools available for future NFT usage, such as NFT mapping leaderboards, research reports, a Hall of Fame, Kanban tool usage rights, and other upcoming NFT tools. The card has no time limit and provides a dedicated channel for cardholders.
